title: Carey scores century but third Test in the balance after day one
summary: Alex Carey hit 106 off 143 balls to help Australia recover from 94-4 to 326-8 at stumps on the opening day of the third Ashes Test against England in Adelaide, in a must-win match for Ben Stokes' side if they're to keep the series alive.

title: 'Walking away a great' - Crawford retires from boxing

title: 'What a stunner' - Crawley takes brilliant catch to remove Head
summary: England's Zak Crawley produces a brilliant one-handed catch to remove Travis Head for 10 as Australia fall to 33-2 on day one of the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.

title: Australia and England pay tribute to victims of Bondi beach shooting
summary: Before the third Ashes Test in Adelaide, Australia and England players observe a moment's silence to pay respect to the victims of the Bondi Beach shooting which took place on Sunday.
